scripts.dev: python -m http.server 3000 2>nul || python3 -m http.server 3000 2>nul || node -e "const http=require('http'),fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');http.createServer((req,res)=>{const f=req.url==='/'?'index.html':req.url.slice(1);const ext=path.extname(f);const type={'html':'text/html','css':'text/css','js':'text/javascript','json':'application/json','png':'image/png'}[ext.slice(1)]||'text/plain';fs.readFile(f,(err,data)=>{if(err){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not found');}else{res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':type});res.end(data);}});}).listen(3000,()=>console.log('Frontend server running at http://localhost:3000'));"
scripts.build: echo Frontend build complete - files ready for deployment
